survey_name: Workplace Ergonomics and Employee Comfort Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and comfort levels regarding workplace ergonomics to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your workstation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your workstation?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the 'None of the above' option is mutually exclusive.

questions.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or adjustments would improve your comfort at work?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format. Include a 'Never' option for completeness.

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your employer provides adequate support for ergonomic improvements?
